item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network at Social Media Marketing Q&A and Discussion in Westborough, MA on Friday, March 1 from 9:00am to 10:30am sponsored by Cereus Women.

Space is limited and this workshop is promoted elsewhere, so don't delay. See below for registration details

About This Event

Do you have questions on how to use social media to market your business?

Not sure how to get started?

Wondering how to actually get clients from social media?

Struggling to get more people to "Like" your facebook page?

Wondering if it's even worth it for your business?

Facilitator Kim Reddington has been using LinkedIn since  2005 and Facebook since 2007, and reports, "I get clients directly as a result of my social media efforts, yet I don't have tons of followers and I'm not on social media daily. I want the same to happen for you."

Come and pick her brain on how to be effective with social media to grow and market your business. Come start a discussion with other entrepreneurs to find out how others are finding success using social media.

Come and share YOUR social media knowledge.

Maybe even network with a potential client or two.

Wish you just had someone to ask all your questions to?

Confused or just starting out on social media and don't even know what to ask?

Just come, listen and learn.

Here's a sample of questions may come up during this event:

  • How many social media sites should I be on?
  • How do I know which social media sites to be active on?
  • How often should I post on Facebook?
  • How often can I promote on Facebook?
  • I have a LinkedIn account, but what should I do with it?
  • How can I get people to comment on my Facebook page?
  • Why do I care if people comment or share posts on my Facebook page?
  • Why aren't people seeing my posts?

Format

  • Cost: $15 in advance/$20 at the door
  • 60 minutes of Social Media Marketing Q&A and discussion, plus time for networking.
  • Bring plenty of business cards.
  • Coffee and muffins will be provided.

Agenda

Our agenda for the meeting will be as follows:

9:00 – Sign in and networking, (registration for those not prepaid)
9:15 – Meetup News and go around the room introducing yourself and sharing business cards
9:30 – Social Media Q&A and discussion
10:20 – Closing remarks, Upcoming events
10:30 – Meeting ends

About the Presenter

Kim Reddington’s entrepreneurial career started in 1995 after she decided that dropping her year old son off at day care every day was just too heart-wrenching. She realized the only way to have the flexibility she needed was to create it herself. That’s when she just quit and took off on her own.

Kim’s journey has led her to helping other women entrepreneurs think big with their online marketing to get all the clients they need and is known as a Client-Generating Website Guru. She helps her clients to build a system around their website that will convert their prospective clients into paying clients.

Driving using GPS?

If you are using a GPS or Navigation System, 1900 West Park Drive often does not appear. Use 1 Research Drive (University of Phoenix) and from there enter Westborough Office Park on West Park Drive, go 1/2 mile, 1900 is on your right. Suite 280 is on the second floor.

Cost and How to Register

$15 in advance/$20 at the door.  Capacity is limited and the event is promoted elsewhere, so you need get a ticket in advance.

Register here or click the Paypal button to reserve your spot.

If you don't have a Paypal account, you can still pay through this link.  First click the Paypal button above, then follow the link labelled "Don't Have a Paypal Account?" to pay with your credit card without logging in to Paypal.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Social Media Marketing Q&A and Discussion
